title: Substitution
text: Substitute the $$x-$$ and $$y-$$ values into the equation to check if the ordered pair is a solution to the equation.

title: Application
text: Substitute $$y$$ for $$-3$$ and $$x$$ for $$0$$. Are $$-3$$ and $$2(0)-3$$ equal? If so, the ordered pair is a solution. If not, the ordered pair is not a solution.
